content.raw:
Thanks for the feedback Russ! 

I just pushed the latest commits that try to incorporate the suggestions from your comments as well as some of the latest modifications coming from the lab \(where the iXon 888 is being extensively used both in kinetics and fast kinetics modes\).  However, notice that while some of these changes were brewed directly in the lab, the merged code remains untested as it stands. 

I will try to test it in the lab as soon as I can, but feel free to review the changes and please let me know if you have any comments. :grin:
content.html:
Thanks for the feedback Russ!

I just pushed the latest commits that try to incorporate the suggestions from your comments as well as some of the latest modifications coming from the lab (where the iXon 888 is being extensively used both in kinetics and fast kinetics modes). However, notice that while some of these changes were brewed directly in the lab, the merged code remains untested as it stands.

I will try to test it in the lab as soon as I can, but feel free to review the changes and please let me know if you have any comments.
